title: Automation.com - All Industrial Automation News and Products

items.title: How Can Robots Make Your Manufacturing Plant More Efficient?
items.author: Buddharatn Ratawal
items.summary:
- **Robots enhance productivity** by performing tasks faster and around the clock. 
- They help **reduce costs** through lower labor needs and less material waste. 
- By taking on **dangerous jobs**, robots improve safety and allow for reprogramming to adapt to changing production demands.

items.title: Davis Mathews Appointed CEO of Phoenix Contact
items.summary:
- *Davis Mathews* has been appointed as the CEO of *Phoenix Contact* for U.S. operations, aiming to drive growth and innovation.
- His leadership will focus on enhancing customer connections and adapting to *Industry 4.0* challenges.
- Mathews brings over 30 years of experience within the company, positioning Phoenix for a new chapter in the competitive U.S. market.

items.title: Silicon Wafer Shipments Rise 10% YoY in Q2 2025
items.summary:
- SEMI reported a *9.6% increase* in worldwide silicon wafer shipments for Q2 2025. 
- Demand for silicon wafers, particularly for **AI data-center chips**, remains strong despite low fab utilization for other devices. 
- Future trends in this industry may be affected by *geopolitical and supply chain dynamics*.

items.title: Critical Manufacturing Acquires Convanit for AI Expansion
items.summary:
- *Critical Manufacturing* has acquired **Convanit**, enhancing its Data Platform with *AI-powered image analytics*.
- Convanit's *c-Alice* solution enables quick, *custom AI model* development for visual inspection without deep expertise.
- The acquisition aims to improve *manufacturing precision* and *automation*, responding to industry challenges in quality and traceability.

items.title: AI Adoption in S&P 500 Firms Brings New Security Challenges
items.summary:
- *AI utilization* in S&P 500 firms presents significant security vulnerabilities, with nearly 1,000 potential weak points identified.
- Industries like finance, healthcare, and technology face unique risks, including *data exposure* and trust issues in AI recommendations.
- Experts stress the importance of treating AI implementation with *robust security measures* to mitigate real-world failures.

items.title: LK Metrology Expands Into Industrial CT by Acquiring Procon X-Ray
items.summary:
- *LK Metrology* has acquired **ProCon X-Ray GmbH**, enhancing its capabilities in industrial *computed tomography (CT)*.
- ProCon X-Ray, known for high-resolution X-ray technology, will expand LK's inspection offerings across various *industries*.
- The collaboration aims to develop new, integrated metrology solutions, reinforcing LK Metrology’s position as a leading provider in the *measurement sector*.

items.title: What Manufacturers Gain by Listening to Their Machines During Volatile Times
items.author: Brian Germain
items.summary:
*Manufacturers are facing high input costs and talent shortages in 2025, pushing them to rethink maintenance strategies.*  
*Condition-based maintenance, supported by real-time data and AI, enables targeted resource allocation, mitigating risks and avoiding unnecessary servicing.*  
*This proactive approach enhances operational resilience, ensuring machines get the attention they need while adapting to rapid changes in production demands.*

items.title: Okuma's Strategic Growth Initiatives
items.summary:
- Okuma America Corp. expands leadership with Mr. Dominick Patriarca as senior vice president of Corporate Strategy.  
- The company invests in new automation technology and a global repair facility to support growth in the manufacturing industry.  
- President Jim King emphasizes the importance of these initiatives for achieving growth targets in the Americas by 2030.

items.title: Siemens' Vision for Connected Industry at SPS Atlanta 2025
items.summary:
* Siemens Digital Industries will reveal a vision for a *connected*, *data-driven*, and *adaptive* industrial enterprise at SPS Atlanta 2025.
* The keynote will address how to integrate *engineering*, *manufacturing*, and *business systems*, breaking down silos for true operational agility.
* Attendees can expect insights on achieving *sustainability*, reducing costs, and enhancing visibility across supply chains.

items.title: Industrial Connectors in AI-driven Manufacturing
items.author: Lee Slater
items.summary:
- *AI is revolutionizing manufacturing*, shifting from static to adaptive systems that rely on robust connectors. 
- Connectors must ensure *high data throughput and signal integrity* while withstanding harsh environments to support real-time data exchange. 
- Smart connectors play a key role in *predictive maintenance*, enabling proactive interventions and the flexibility required in modern modular automation systems.

items.title: Dr. Philipp Nellessen Appointed New CEO
items.summary:
- Dr. Philipp Nellessen became the CEO of Doppstadt Beteiligungs GmbH on July 1, 2025, bringing *international expertise*.
- He has a notable background with Thyssenkrupp AG and aims to strategically advance Doppstadt's reputation in the industry.
- He succeeds Dr. Konrad Kerres, who has contributed significantly during his tenure, and is focused on *innovative solutions* for the future.

items.title: Powering Industrial IoT with 5G and IFPP
items.author: Sönke Schröder
items.summary:
- *Private 5G networks* provide reliable, low-latency connectivity essential for industrial environments. 
- *IFPP* enhances security through seamless and rapid device onboarding, maintaining control over device identity. 
- Together, they create a robust infrastructure, driving efficiency and resilience in the growing *Industrial IoT* landscape.

items.title: NEMA Commends Prioritization of Grid Expansion, Modernization
items.summary:
- The NEMA President praised the White House's AI Action Plan focusing on energy and manufacturing to enhance the U.S. electric grid.
- Emphasizing the need for a *modernized* power grid, the plan highlights advanced technologies to meet rising electricity demand.
- NEMA supports a robust domestic manufacturing base and compliance with federal standards to ensure sustainable solutions.

items.title: Allgon's 2024 Annual Report Highlights Resilience
items.summary:
- Allgon reported *stable* net sales of SEK 718.8 million amidst *global uncertainties*.
- The company launched the *Allgon Common Platform*, enhancing its technology and market reach.
- With a focus on *sustainability*, Allgon achieved a 12.4% operating profit margin and aims for a 15% reduction in emissions by 2025.

items.title: Galco Celebrates 50 Years of Industrial Innovation
items.summary:
- **Galco Industrial Electronics** marks its 50th anniversary, evolving from a small operation to a global leader in industrial automation.
- The company serves **over 100,000 customers** and is committed to innovation and solving customers' toughest challenges.
- Celebrations include the **2025 Galco Electronics & Automation Show**, featuring live demos and networking opportunities.

items.title: Emerson Expands AI in Test and Measurement Software
items.summary:
- Emerson introduces *Nigel AI Advisor*, enhancing their test software. 
- This tool leverages *large language models* to improve engineers' productivity and manage complex testing environments. 
- Plans for further *integration of AI capabilities* across its software portfolio aim to streamline engineers' tasks.

items.title: Industrial Foundation Models Are Transforming Engineering and Manufacturing
items.author: Tali Segall
items.summary:
- *Industrial Foundation Models* bridge human expertise with machine efficiency, tailored for complex industrial environments.
- These models enhance processes like design, production, and maintenance through advanced AI interaction grounded in *engineering principles*.
- Successful implementation requires collaboration across industries to create smarter, safer manufacturing systems and innovative human-machine partnerships.

items.title: Mouser Launches New Automation-Focused Resource Center
items.summary:
- *Mouser Electronics* introduces an **automation resource center** aimed at engineering professionals in the field of industrial automation.
- This hub features resources on *Industry 5.0*, *open-source technologies*, and *sensors*, providing insights into modern automation practices.
- The resource center is intended to **empower** engineers with tools and information to enhance efficiency and safety in manufacturing processes.

items.title: HiveMQ Joins Inductive Automation Ecosystem
items.summary:
- *HiveMQ* partners with *Inductive Automation* to enhance industrial intelligence.
- This collaboration enables manufacturers to connect *operational technology* with *enterprise IT systems* seamlessly.
- The integration provides a robust, *scalable architecture* for real-time data management and AI-readiness.

items.title: Alva Industries Publishes New White Papers on FiberPrinting Motor Production Technology
items.summary:
- Alva Industries has released new *white papers* on their innovative **FiberPrinting** motor technology, aimed at high-performance applications.
- This technology allows for the precise customization of *stator configurations*, enhancing performance across various domains, including robotics and marine applications.
- The white papers can be accessed from their new dedicated area on the Alva website, emphasizing the company's commitment to sharing knowledge on *advanced motor design*.

items.title: Automating From Above: Why Vertical Robotics Is No Longer Optional
items.author: Mathias Entenmann
items.summary:
- Manufacturers face *urgent labor shortages* and need innovative solutions. 
- **Vertical robotics** maximizes space efficiency and operational flexibility beyond traditional floor constraints. 
- The transition to overhead automation can **transform** industrial operations, facilitating growth without extensive infrastructure changes.

items.title: Does Your Manufacturing Company Need a Security Operations Center (SOC)?
items.author: Zac Amos
items.summary:
- *Cybersecurity* is increasingly critical for manufacturing due to rising cyber threats.
- A *Security Operations Center (SOC)* enhances proactive threat protection, response times, and overall security.
- Businesses may consider in-house, managed, or hybrid SOC options to meet their specific needs and budget.

items.title: RS Group’s 2024/25 ESG Report Showcases Significant Progress
SEMI and Arizona State University Partner for Education
items.summary:
- SEMI partners with *Arizona State University* to enhance semiconductor and AI education.
- New courses on *AI*, *packaging*, and *process characterization* are available on the SEMI University platform.
- The initiative aims to equip current and future professionals with **in-demand skills** for industry growth.

items.title: IFS Surges Ahead in H1 2025: 30% ARR Growth
items.summary:
- IFS achieved a remarkable *30% YoY growth* in Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) in H1 2025, highlighting its strong market position. 
- The company pushed innovation with *agentic AI* solutions designed for industrial applications, including the *Nexus Black* accelerator and the acquisition of *TheLoops*. 
- With a growing customer base and significant cloud revenue increases, IFS solidifies its status as a leader in the *Industrial AI* sector.

items.title: Ransomware Attacks Fall by Almost Half in Q2
items.summary:
- Ransomware attacks dropped *43%* in Q2 2025, influenced by seasonal factors and law enforcement efforts.  
- *North America* faced the highest impact with 58% of attacks, while groups like *Qilin* and *Akira* led in attack volume.  
- The rise of politically motivated ransomware highlights its emerging role in *cyber warfare*, prompting increased focus on cybersecurity measures.

items.title: OnLogic and viso.ai Partner for Edge AI Vision
items.summary:
- OnLogic and viso.ai have teamed up to enhance *edge AI computer vision* deployment.
- Their partnership simplifies complex deployments, allowing businesses to leverage AI capabilities seamlessly.
- Key benefits include *accelerated deployment*, *enhanced scalability*, and *rugged reliability* for diverse industries.

items.title: Rockwell Automation's Video Series Highlights Data-Driven Operations
items.summary:
- Rockwell Automation has expanded its ROKStudios video series, focusing on *data-driven operations* to enhance business capabilities.
- The new season features interviews with industry leaders discussing the *impact of digitalization* on operational and financial outcomes.
- Insights include the importance of *collaboration between technology and human ingenuity* for effective automation and *cybersecurity posture* enhancement.

items.title: New Calibration Framework for Digital Twins
items.summary:
- Researchers at Pusan National University have developed a *Bayesian calibration framework* to enhance the accuracy of **digital twins** in manufacturing.
- This framework addresses issues of *parameter uncertainty* and operational discrepancies, optimizing performance with significantly less data than conventional methods.
- It promises to transform automated material handling systems by enabling reusable and adaptable digital twin models across various industries.

items.title: Proving Sustainability Progress in Warehousing and Distribution
items.author: Nate Chenenko
items.summary:
- The outbound supply chain is crucial for demonstrating sustainability but lacks standardized measurement methods.
- Identifying areas for waste reduction in warehousing, packaging, and transportation can lead to significant *emissions* and *cost savings*.
- Proper tracking and data analysis can enable companies to meet *corporate sustainability goals* while boosting profitability.

items.title: Precision with Purpose: ANCA Unveils 2025-2030 Sustainability Strategy
items.summary:
- ANCA's *Sustainability Strategy 2025–2030* focuses on *environmental responsibility*, *innovation*, and *community impact*.
- The company aims to reduce GHG emissions by *42%* for Scope 1 and 2 and *25%* for Scope 3 by 2030, aligning with the *Science Based Targets initiative*.
- Key commitments include promoting a *circular economy*, enhancing *diversity*, and ensuring *ethical sourcing* within the supply chain.

items.title: SEMI Reports Global Semiconductor Equipment Sales Forecast
items.summary:
- SEMI forecasts that global semiconductor equipment sales will reach *$125.5 billion* in 2025, marking a *7.4% increase* from the previous year.
- Significant growth is driven by investments in **AI technologies** and capacity expansions across leading-edge logic and memory.
- China, Taiwan, and Korea are predicted to be the top regions for equipment spending, although sales in China may decline from record highs.

items.title: KUKA to Showcase Automated Machine Tool Tending and More at CMTS 2025
items.summary:
- *KUKA Robotics* will present advanced robotic solutions for manufacturing at CMTS 2025.  
- The exhibit will feature autonomous mobile robots and automated machine tool tending, enhancing *productivity* and operational efficiency.  
- Solutions like the *CyberDrawer* and KR CYBERTECH robots demonstrate versatile, compact designs suited for various manufacturing environments.

items.title: Warehouse Automation: Building a Strong, Data-Driven Business Case
items.author: Nabil Hasan
items.summary:
- **Economic pressures** and high demand for speed compel automation in warehouses.
- A strong, *data-informed business case* is essential for securing funding and addressing barriers to automation.
- Key steps include defining ROI goals, understanding costs, and involving the right stakeholders in the process.

items.title: Franziska Kunz Becomes Head of Global ESG at Kistler
items.summary:
- *Franziska Kunz* has been appointed as the new *Head of Global ESG and Sustainability* at Kistler, aiming to enhance sustainable business practices.
- The company is committed to reducing emissions and expanding *sustainable solutions*, having already achieved a significant reduction in CO2 emissions since 2021.
- Kistler's initiatives include boosting *electromobility*, promoting circular economy projects, and integrating sustainability into product development to meet future challenges.

items.title: TotalEnergies and Emerson Collaborate on Industrial Data
items.summary:
- TotalEnergies and Emerson are partnering to utilize *advanced digital technologies* for real-time data collection at industrial sites.
- The collaboration aims to improve *operational efficiency*, *energy use*, and *environmental performance* through AI integration.
- The rollout of Emerson’s Aspen Technology will enhance anomaly detection, energy optimization, and overall operational safety over the next two years.

items.title: ABB Wins Contract to Support Electrification of Azerbaijan Facility
items.summary:
- ABB has secured a significant contract from *bp* to electrify one of the world's largest oil and gas terminals in Azerbaijan, enhancing *power grid stability*.
- The project, initiated in February 2025, involves integrating *synchronous condensers* to reduce reliance on gas turbines, thus lowering costs and improving efficiency.
- This initiative supports Azerbaijan's climate goals, aiming for *30% renewable power capacity by 2030* and a *40% reduction in GHG emissions by 2050*.

items.title: Schneeberger Group Expands With New U.S. Facility
items.summary:
* *Schneeberger* has established a new production facility in *Rock Hill, South Carolina*, enhancing customer proximity and market responsiveness.
* This facility will support sustainable manufacturing, significantly reducing CO₂ emissions compared to traditional materials.
* The expansion, set to begin by Q4 2025, aligns with Schneeberger's 'local for local' strategy and aims to foster job creation in the region.

items.title: PACK EXPO Las Vegas Celebrates 30 Years of Innovation
items.summary:
- **PACK EXPO Las Vegas** marks its 30th anniversary in 2025, showcasing industry evolution in packaging and processing.
- The event will host 2,300 exhibitors across over 1 million square feet, attracting **35,000 attendees** internationally.
- **Innovative features** include specialized pavilions, sustainability sessions, and curated tours for better attendee engagement.

items.title: Experts Discuss Autonomous Mobile Robots in New Ebook
items.summary:
- Mouser Electronics and Texas Instruments have published an *Ebook* featuring insights from 13 experts on how *autonomous mobile robots (AMRs)* are transforming various industries.
- The Ebook addresses operational efficiency, worker safety, and market demands while highlighting Texas Instruments' contributions to mobile robotics.
- Key technologies discussed include innovative power supply designs and *high-performance processors* crucial for modern robotic applications.

items.title: Critical Manufacturing Named as a Representative Vendor in 2025 Gartner Market Guide for MES
items.summary:
- *Critical Manufacturing* has been recognized as a **Representative Vendor** in the 2025 Gartner Market Guide for MES due to its innovative MES solutions.
- The company emphasizes the importance of its *low-code capabilities* and vertical solutions tailored for industries such as semiconductor and medical devices.
- Gartner warns manufacturing leaders to consider factors beyond production requirements when evaluating MES vendors to enhance system adaptability and customization.

items.title: BitFlow CoaXPress Frame Grabber Aids in SuperKEKB Particle Accelerator Beam Failure Troubleshooting
Why a Successful Modern Manufacturing Career Hinges on a Connected Worker Model
items.author: Bill Blank
items.summary:
- The manufacturing sector faces an anticipated *shortage of 1.9 million workers* by 2033 due to a talent deficit.  
- Implementing *connected worker technology* can enhance recruitment, retention, retraining, and knowledge transfer within the manufacturing workforce.  
- This approach fosters a *dynamic and engaged workforce*, essential for adapting to industry changes and retaining valuable expertise.

items.title: Debra Phillips to Keynote SPS Atlanta 2025
items.summary:
- **Debra Phillips**, president and CEO of NEMA, will present the keynote at **SPS Atlanta 2025**, focusing on the urgent need to modernize the U.S. *electrical grid*.
- Her keynote, titled *“Powering the Electric Future,”* will discuss the role of emerging technologies and public-private partnerships in ensuring energy resilience.
- The event will feature an education program with over 20 sessions addressing critical trends in *industrial automation*.

items.title: Predictive Maintenance With IoT and AI Enhances Equipment Reliability
items.author: Yadavan Dharmarajan
items.summary:
- *Predictive maintenance* utilizes **IoT sensors** and **AI** to forecast equipment failures, reducing downtime significantly.
- Companies implementing this technology can achieve cost savings of up to **12%** on maintenance and enhance overall equipment effectiveness by **9%**.
- The transition includes challenges like *data integration* and *training*, yet advances in cloud platforms make adoption easier.

items.title: Industrial Cybersecurity Trends Reflected in 15 Most-Read Articles
items.summary:
**Key trends in industrial cybersecurity are highlighted through the 15 most-read articles:**
- The articles cover various critical topics such as *AI-powered cybersecurity* and *quantum computing's impact*.
- Topics include *remote access vulnerabilities* and a *shift toward business outcomes mentality* in OT cybersecurity.
- Insights from contributors emphasize the *importance of collaboration* and updating security frameworks for modern challenges.

items.title: AI and Human Expertise in Engineering
items.author: Mouser Electronics Inc
items.summary:
- The latest Mouser series focuses on the *integration of AI* with *human expertise* in engineering. 
- AI tools enhance efficiency by handling time-consuming tasks, allowing engineers to tackle *high-level challenges* and innovate more effectively. 
- A human-centric approach ensures that technology serves as a *trusted collaborator* in engineering breakthroughs.

items.title: Indofen Leverages Siemens Xcelerator
items.summary:
- Indofen Furnaces LLP adopts *Siemens' Industrial Edge* for improved efficiency and sustainability in aluminum recycling.
- Real-time analytics enhance operational transparency, reduce fuel usage, and minimize downtime.
- The collaboration exemplifies how *digital transformation* can foster growth and competitiveness in the manufacturing sector.

items.title: Frog Force 503 Robotics Team Cuts and Forms Metal
items.summary:
- The *Frog Force 503* robotics team toured BLM GROUP USA to explore advanced metal fabrication technologies.
- The event included live demonstrations of state-of-the-art machinery, enhancing the team's engineering knowledge.
- This partnership aims to foster creative solutions and long-term collaboration between education and industry.

items.title: The Collaborative Revolution in Manufacturing
items.author: Dijam Panigrahi
items.summary:
- The integration of *AI*, *digital twins*, and **cobots** is transforming manufacturing and logistics, enhancing productivity and safety.
- AI optimizes operations while digital twins allow for virtual testing, reducing risks in deployments.
- Collaborative robots free human workers from repetitive tasks, enabling them to focus on higher-value activities, supported by *upskilling* technologies like AR/VR.
